title: Champion Select lagg(?) and booted out.
body:
Hi there, I was just in a champion select for a ranked solo queue game and once it was only a couple of seconds left i pressed the champion I wanted, but a window came up saying "Retrieving data from server..." for a few seconds and then I got booted out. I wouldn't have cared about this if it was just the temporary ban, but points for this as well, when I did everything I could to join, is a bit angering. Is there anyway you could help me with this? Thanks.

/"MrBiG84"

replies.body:
Might have been that you had the misfortune of lagging during that exact moment. Goes to show that you shouldn't leave a few seconds on the timer to select a champion.

You probably won't have that loss removed from your profile, as it was a promotion. You can't have people leaving promo games, and it was what you agreed to when you started ranked.

Best of luck in the future, though!

It wasn't a promotion series, if that's what you mean. The only thing Im annoyed about is the loss of points you get from "dodging" solo ranked champion select, when I really didn't do anything wrong.

Oh, sorry, I misinterpreted "but points for this as well" as a result of a loss on your profile, which I'm all to familiar with in my promo games. Haven't actually left a normal ranked game, so I didn't know the point penalty applies there too.
